caption.p: Characterization of size-based capture. ( A) Illustration of capture and separation of 3 different sizes of fluorescently labeled silica particles by VIRRION with 3 zones of ITDs. ( B) Fluorescent and combined bright-field images of particles captured and separated by VIRRION into individual zones. (Scale bar: 200 Âµm.) ( C) Capture efficiency of different silica particles captured by VIRRIONS under different flow rates. ( D) Capture efficiency of silica particles after multiple repeated capture by the same VIRRION.
